title: How to Make Vegetable Chops for Chapati

steps.headline: Roast the whole spices mentioned above in the ingredients.
Grind the roasted whole spices and set them aside in a bowl.
Fry the ginger and green chilis until they give off a light aroma.
Add the grated beetroot and carrot.
Add the mashed potatoes, salt, sugar, coriander leaves and ground roasted spices.
Cool the mixture and make the mixture into cutlet balls.
Dip the balls in the flour mixture and then in the bread crumbs.
Fry them in oil until they turn golden brown.
Serve them with hot sauce and ketchup.

text: Roast the whole spices mentioned above in the ingredients.  Grind the roasted whole spices and set them aside in a bowl.  Fry the ginger and green chilis until they give off a light aroma.  Add the grated beetroot and carrot. Sauté well. Add the mashed potatoes, salt, sugar, coriander leaves and ground roasted spices. Mix well. Cool the mixture and make the mixture into cutlet balls.  Dip the balls in the flour mixture and then in the bread crumbs.  Fry them in oil until they turn golden brown. Serve hot! Serve them with hot sauce and ketchup.
